page.description: A new static method has been added to the SQL::TableInfo object. The .ParseTableName() method takes a fully qualified tablename and returns the base table name, owner, schema and catalog for the table. For example
page.example:
dim CatalogName as C dim SchemaName as C dim OwnerName as C dim BaseTableName as C dim FullName as C = "dbo.[hello.world]" dim ti as sql::tableinfo ?ti.ParseTableName(CatalogName, SchemaName, OwnerName, BaseTableName, FullName) = .T.
?CatalogName = ""
?SchemaName = ""
?OwnerName = "dbo"
?BaseTableName = "dAgency.06"
?fullname = "[dAgency.06]"
